message.content:
<<<api>>>: StringTokenizer.nextToken
<<<code>>>: String currentString = "Fruit: they taste good";
String[] splitString = currentString.split(":");
String firstString = splitString[0].trim();
String secondString = splitString[1].trim();
textView1.setText(firstString);
textView2.setText(secondString);
<<<explanation>>>: In this code, we first split the currentString using the ":" delimiter using the split() method. This will give us an array of strings, where the first element is "Fruit" and the second element is "they taste good". We then trim both strings to remove any leading or trailing spaces. Finally, we set the text of textView1 to the firstString and the text of textView2 to the secondString.
